reviews.review:
Bioshock Infinite is great. 

The Season Pass is only average content:

Clash in the clouds isn't a story, as far as I can see. It's just challenge maps. 

I just played Burial at Sea Ep 1, and it finished in about 1.5 hours. It was garbage. I spent all my time picking stuff like coins, and health up, and the rest of my time dying. I had to turn down the difficulty coz I was dying every encounter before that. It was just hard, boring, and added nothing to the Infinite experience. (Elizabeth is there and she just got in the way as much as anything. A few times she obsructed an exit to an area I had just gone in, e.g. like behind a bar or counter.)

The story just doesn't sit with with Infinite.


Ep 2 is not so bad and longer than Ep 1, but still fairly short. It does get going in the way Infinite does, meaning you get involved in the story of it. The tasks work in the same way Infinite does so you become immersed. It was strange at the start. Ammo was in pityful supply and I got trapped and stuck, meaning it checkpointed just before I died. Every time I tried I died exactly the same. I gave up thinking the Season Pass was a waste of money. After many months I came back out of curiosity, and found I was being revived somewhere completely different. The invisibilty plasma I had was gone. I played on and had a blast with it for a few hours.

mir hat dieses spiel sehr gut gefallen.
+gute grafik
+einfallsreich
+viel emotionales
+ein feeling des hinterher-fieberns *g*

naja, ich übertreib. es war dennoch wirklich gut und für quantenphysiker sicher ein interessantes gedankenexperiement.
Bioshock ROCKS!

My Mind is officially blown!!!!!! You need to play this game!!!! Not just for the thrilling combat, not just for the stunning graphics but play this for the epic story!! Don't debate about buying this game just do it!

Великолепная, атмосферная и многогранная игра. Исполнение мира и сюжетная линия настолько хороши, что играть в этот шутер от первого лица можно даже тем, кто не любит шутеры от первого лица.

Меня как человека неопытного в этом жанре очень радует вариативность возможностей прохождения боевых сцен.
Но больше всё же привлекает детализация мира и очаровательные вспомогательные персонажи.

Ачешуеннейшая гама... №1 2013 года - The Best! 
Лучший сюжет 2013 года в шутерах, лучшая атмосфера, прошел 3 раза) пройду еще)

เกมดีมากครับ......อย่าไปเชื่อที่คนอื่นบอกว่า เกมห่วย ไม่ดีไม่แนะนำ..ต้องลองด้วยตัวเองครับ...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jjkpdjkuLJI
This game just blew my mind, thats all.

The game about choices but without choices.
the story is stereotypical garbage, but shooting part was realy fun, surprisably.

I ove many 2K games and this one really was a good game. I did have some issues when I first ran it due to my video graphics settings. I sometimes have issues with FOV and once I tweeked my seetings everything was ok. This isn't a knock on the game, just a reality I have to live with.

The story line of this game is really great. It gets you into the frame of mind of the main player and then throws plot twists and confusion to keep you on your toes. If you are someone who is just interested in a game that is all about killing things and using powers, then this game is ok too. I just think that the story line adds so much more to the game.

I was worried about the follower (when you have her) and her being a liability, but she wasn't. She is very much a helpful part of the game.

I recommend this, and the DLCs as a very good FPS with a fantastically twisted story line.

Игра изумительная, гениальная! Всё в ней поражает: графика, аудио- и видеоэффекты, персонажи, атмосфера... но особенно захватывает сюжет. Сама лишь идея о параллельных мирах в высшей степени плодотворна, а при совмещении с наработками талантливых разработчиков, сценаристов и художников... она превращается в истинный шедевр - Bioshock Infinite.

Это не просто шутер, это потрясающая игра, которая основывается на трёх китах: противоборстве государственных строев, теории разветвлённости пространственно-временного континуума и проблеме жизненного выбора. Звучит уже внушительно, не правда ли? Что ж, за одну концовку я ставлю десять баллов.
The best game I have ever played
Tout est réussi c'est beau , c'est jouable et le scenario est bien tordu. Une petite merveille !

BioShock Infinite это вообще не BioShock. Куда честнее было бы назвать её просто Infinite. О BioShock и BioShock 2, напоминают пару незначительных мелочей и насильное притягивание за уши Columbia к Rapture. За исключением обманутых ожиданий игра великолепная.
Cualquier adjetivo que califique este juego ya ha sido utilizado. 11/10. Nada más que comentar

Hab leider nicht mehr viel Zeit zum Spielen. Die früheren BioShock finde ich jedoch bedeutend spannender

Deez gam mad me shock infinitly so lik rite now Im still shock like I am infinitley shocked about dis and is gud not bad becus like deh many other prototype infinite games alx freeman takes on the roll as a young black individuals roaming the streets of compton who is aspiring to be come a real nig mang who raps about rap and lifes about his rap but his son colby is 2ooo 2012 to be any good in the game so the overall taste was apple on the nurngurber taste scale but you know what really makes me anger is that these bioshockingly great smokes didnt have fiyah which ruins dhe flavors leaving dis at a ratting of week nijjer that doesnt take up all the space. eat at five fries burjer and guys

LIke a horrible movie that last 10+ hours.
10 hours of searching though trash cans for silverdollers and some semblence of a plotline. a total bore & huge disapointment..
An excellent game with great story-telling.  I definitely recommend this, by itself, and in comparison to Bioshock 2, it is a striking improvement.

Mit BioShock Infinite habe ich erstmals ein Spiel der BioShock-Reihe gespielt und war von Beginn an begeistert !
BioShock Inifite schafft mit einem futuristischen Zeitalter und altmodischer Musik und Kleidung einer perfekte Kombination.
Das ganze ist mit einer sehr schönen und kitschigen Grafik und wunderschönen Map Desgine, die das Gefühl von einer Welt ohne Kriminalität und Offenheit vorspielt, unterlegt.

Jedoch punktet das Spiel nicht nur mit Grafik, die unglaubliche Atmospähre aufbaut, sondern auch die Story ist exellent !
Sie ist sehr umfassend und vor allem enthält sie viele Details die am Ende des Spieles erst zum vorschein kommen und letzten Endes einfach Brilliant sind !!

Das Gameplay ist zwar nicht so umfassend wie von einem Battlefield oder Skyrim, jedoch nicht schlecht, sondern "nur" gut.
Letzten Endes brauch keine tausenden spieleriche Optionen, aufgrund der Atmospäre, Grafik und der Story fühlt es sich wie ein erst Klasse Film mit Action-Einlagen an den man selbst der Held ist an.

Ich kann das Spiel nur weiterempfehlen !
Excelente.  Conteudo da estória poderia se tornar um filme "A" com direito a oscar facilmente.

Very good game but a bit overated in my opinion I would give it a 8/10 .Cool graphics and good twisted storyline like all the bioshock serie.

Beautiful 10/10
This game has guide-line. Follow it and win. 10/Cheat
It's better than most other games.

29 hrs In two play throughs... minus the time left idle paused or while away in a menu. Its too linear for my taste, there arent really any choices the player needs to make, minimal thinking required. Almost everything is laid out in a straight line for you. Its not a bad game, great graphics, fun weapons and powers, and a good story until the end (dont get me started there; I know what they TRIED to do, they just failed horribly in my opinion). Its worth picking up for under (I'll be nice) $30, but in NO WAY was this the game of the year and worthy of all the praise it got from the media. I would give it an 8.5/10 at most.
sehr sehr geil

Second time playing this game, and it is as spectacular as the first. I had it on the Xbox360, which has now been hijacked so thought it only right to buy it again. It really is a superb game with the storyline and characters breath life into this FPS.
nice

What the actual fudge did i play?

That game, that story, that ending... damn.

I do not want to see another airship. ever. again.
If you think this game is smart or intelligent in any way and that it has good gameplay, you were probably the kid in class high off glue and you deserved to have the daylights beaten out of you.

Ok here is the thing, this game is fucking amazing. With Ken Levine back into the developing of the bioshock series, this was most certainly a diserving finale, they took the best things about the first two games, wich was the inovative FPS combat, with plasmids and "heavy hitters", and mixed it with one of the best storylines i have ever played through, making it not a game, but an interactive theatrical performance. The whole open world-ish type levels are still there, with beautifull locations and the whole environmental storytelling thing, that tell you side stories paralel to the events of the main game by simply placing a couple of bodies, a smere of blood and a voxophone (audio diary), and this gives you an incredible sense of freedom without actually sacrificing the immersion of the whole thing, wich is really hard to get right. This game was an awesome way to start the finale for an awesome series, and Irrational has done it again. 10/10.

Compared to its predecessors, Bioshock Infinite's graphics are flawless, plot interesting (if not a bit confusing), and overall pretty superior in a superficial way. The only issue I had with the game was that it felt very, very disconnected from the previous games. Though they both focus on political and social sciences, Bioshock Infinite is like a separate game altogether. Don't get me wrong, I loved this game, but it definitely felt a little weird when there was little to no mention of Rapture and/or Andrew Ryan. Burial at Sea made up for that, I suppose, but maybe a little more Rapture would have been nice in the plot. 

Overall, it was confusing (had to do some reading after playing it to connect all the dots) but enjoyable, I liked the plot, even though the racism was a little hard to bear at points (not the intended racism, mind you.) I would buy this game again, and it was actually a nice change to see the bright colors and sunny sky instead of the dark-underwater landscape of Rapture. You should buy it, despite it's flaws, and you'll enjoy it.

Игра пройдена мной за 7 часов, сюжет не очень понятный 6 из 10, графика 9 из 10, в игре присутствуют дополнительные истори. Если у вас есть лишние деньги, то можите её купить и подюбоваться красотами этой игры=)
ЗАЕБИСЬ
I highly suggest this game to any nerds out there, as it is one of my favorites. It may be a shooter game, but it has probably the nerdiest storyline of any game I've ever played.

The game  is one huge masterpiece from every perspective, gameplay, story, graphics, sound, animation, level design, everything just fits in and makes this game unique. What I really liked and want to point out though is the carefully crafted story and main characters as well as the villains who make it come to life. All of the dialogs and lines of each and every character is natural.
As for the DLC, and I'm refering to "Burial at sea" Episodes 1 & 2, well, it is sad that the DLC of the game completes the story, because the games itself is complicated enough if you don't pay attention and it leaves room for things to be discussed, and that is the way that the game was meant to be.
However the way the two Episodes complete the story is not just unexpected but if you've played the first and original Bioshock, it makes an even greater twist in the entire story as it takes place in the city  of Rapture, when it still was at it's state of glory.
If you choose to play this game I really recommend giving it time and paying attetion to the story and what it has to say, as by doing so you get the most out of it.
First playthrough in 2014. Second the same year. Now, in 2021 that game still offers top notch single player experience, story, characters... Still a masterpiece.

One of the best game on Mac. Highly recommanded.

I am going to play to Bioshock, and Bioshock II now :)

Bioshock Infinite.... What can I say without spoiling it? It's a great game, but only a decent fps with a great story and stunning visuals, Especially the enviroments and architecture.
The main characters, Booker and Elizabeth are two of my favourite protagonists in recent gaming history and I can't formulate the words or any coherent thoughts when it comes to the end of Bioshock Infinite or Burial at sea part 1 and 2. You just have to play the game and experience this for yourself. So lets list some pros and cons:

Pros:
Visually appealing if you like color and unique aesthetics, Due to the setting.
Strong focus on the story and storytelling.
Interesting protagonists.
(And for me at least) Immersive.
Morally Ambiguous Villian.

Cons:
The story gets somewhat convoluted, It's not hard to follow but it's hard to digest.
The Lenght of the game is somewhat short, it is worth buying and replaying it just to try the 1999 mode but I'd have liked a little more content
The Combat, It can get repetitive quickly if you don't use all the different guns, vigors and enviroment.

If the pros outweights the cons for you, I'd recommend you to buy it, With the dlc included since you get to visit rapture once more in the infinite engine, my biggest complaint is the ending and how they weave Burial at sea into the bioshock story.

Here is to hoping for a new Bioshock game in the close future, "Constants and variables".

The best game I have ever played, A dense and intellectual storyline beter than I lot of book I've read and it looks amazing, even on very low settings with a GTX620M. Lets you live the story rather than read it. A must buy for all PC gamers.
Das Spiele würde sich schon alleine für die Story lohnen, da hätte es das gute Game-Play gar nicht gebraucht. Das hat es aber trotzdem, also ein Spiel das man unbedingt gespielt haben sollte.

엔딩 봤습니다.... 아직도 멘붕상태...
엔딩 보면 왜 바이오쇼크 '인피니티' 인지 알게되실겁니다.. 진짜 사고 후회 안하는 게임. 정말 재밌습니다.

바이오쇼크 시리즈가 해저도시에서 하늘로 올라갔습니다. 그리고 해저는 물론 하늘에서도 저를 실망시키지 않았군요.
1편 2편에서 보여줬던 해저도시 특유의 음산한 분위기는 사라졌지만 이번 인피니트에서는 그래픽의 눈부신 발전과 절경들로 이를 대신하였습니다.

그리고 근접무기로도 모든걸 해결할수 있었던 1편 2편과 달리 이번에는 총을 위주로 전투를 하게되며 강력한 적들이 다수 등장하고 치료킷과 주사기를 소지할 수 없다는 점에서 전투 난이도는 상승한 것으로 느껴집니다.
바이오쇼크답게 이번 시리즈도 스토리는 대만족이었습니다.

아쉬운 점이 있다면 공식 한글화를 했음에도 일지들에 자막이 표시되지 않고 오역들이 남아있는 점과 리틀시스터를 채취 또는 구원함으로써 엔딩의 분기가 나뉘었던 1편 2편과는 달리 이번 시리즈에서는 엔딩분기를 나눌수가 없다는 점이 되겠습니다.
Easily the best story of any video game I've ever played. It can get tedious at times, the combat is limited but still fun. The story though. The story.

One of the best games i have ever played. The story of this game is so gripping you never want stop playing. I wasted countless hours playing this game because of how gripping it was.

The characters in the game are well made with some very familliar voices. The animation and graphics are just stunning, from the beautiful, plentaful streets at the carnival to the desolate streets of the shanty. One of the most beautiful games ive ever played.

The only problems with the game i could find is at times in the middle of the game i felt like it was being streched out by making you go back and forth through goons that you have already defeated. Also at some points you would run out of bullets for the guns you have and then you have to pick up a gun that feels much inefficient for the task at hand.

Verdict: Bioshock Infinite, has one of the most gripping stories ever, stunning graphics, animations are done very well, guns work very well but just run out of ammo for me XD, and sadly suffers for extendanitis in the middle.     

Rating: 9/10, alot of singleplayer games are not made this well these days and its good to see that developers like rational games can still provide the gripping singleplayer games they always have provided.
Best Indiana Jones game ever!

Bioshock Infinite is one of the most amazing games ever and it's one of my top favorite games. I bought it on PS3 the day it came out, on a whim, and I'm glad I did. I've played trough twice, once on my PS3 and once on PC. The game looks beautiful. It has an amazing story, and plays really smooth on the PC. I easily give this game a 10 out of 10.

By far the funnest Bioshock for me, but the dlc is where i found this game to thrive. Burial at Sea is one of the best dlc's ive played. so much depth in story just in a little dlc (not gonna spoil anything but fantastic). I would say get the dlc's with the game to get the best Bioshock experience imaginable!

Also ich muss sagen das Spiel überzeugt mich gar nicht - 
Schlauchlevels ... fast immer muss man durch die gleichen Abschnitte mehrfach (Spoiler: Zwarin unterschiedlichen Dimensionen aber cmon die sehen gleich aus zu fast 100%?!?!)...
Und dieses hin und her laufen  um dann nochmal loot abzuholen (die schlüssel -safe nummer)  das ist echt mega lame...  wenn es open world wäre dann kann man ja noch ein wenig improvisieren was die Routen angehen würde aber bei Schlauchlevels... das suckt...Und diese Safe Schlüsselnummer soll nur Zeit schinden damit man das Game nicht gleich durch hat...)
und irgendwie fehlt für einen modernen Shooter die Charakterentwicklung total... es gibt zwar einige Elemente wie "Ausrüstung" aber das ist irgendwie lustlos erstellt worden und das Freispielen von Kräften (Waffen hat man recht schnell alle) täuscht nicht über das fade Gameplay hinweg... ingesamt kein schlechter Shooter da einige Storyelemente überraschend und lustig sind aber alles in Allem auch kein übermäßiger Shooter.... Kaufempfehlung für unter 10 Euro - maximal 15
I think tis game have been my favorite in years. I usually not write an review. actully this is my first. it was the end that got me.

No tengo palabras para describirlo. Divertidísimo, con una jugabilidad sencilla y un apartado gráfico espectacular.
Pero la historia... Algo totalmente magnífico. Una historia apasionante, envolvente y, sobre todo, inesperada. La misma historia gira sobre sí misma varias veces, pero de una manera magistral. Y llega a un final de una manera sublime.
El mejor de la saga, con diferencia, y uno de los mejores juegos que he tenido el placer de probar.
-----------------------------------------------------
Words can´t just capture it. Great fun, easy to learn to play and spectacular graphics.
But the story... Just marvellous. An embracing story and, above all, unexpected. It turns around itself several times, but master crafted. And reaches the ending in a sublime way.
Best installment in the saga, and one of the best games I´ve ever played.
СУПЕР!!!!
I ❤ This Game!  ~Bioshock Infinite should be in every Gamer's Library!
Très bon FPS-RPG. A recommander bien qu'un peu facile en mode normal.

Bioshock Infinite is the prequel to the first game but will you want to witness how it all began or just skip this and got to the first one ? In Bioshock Infinite you plays Booker Dewitt. Hes a private detective whos sent to columbia. A city thats above the clouds to recover a woman named Elizabeth. Once you get there you find out that somethings very wrong so its up to you to get Elizabeth and Get out of the flying city. So how is this game ? Its actually the best one in the series. The gameplay is what you remember just improved. The gunplay is smooth and alot of fun. The game alos provides you with a ton of Vigors to choose from. The game also Looks outstanding. Wihtout a doubt one of the best looking games as of now. The game isnt linear so you can go explore columbia at youre will. The gameplay also has a few problems. The game only allows you to carry 2 guns which is quite sad because theres some really cool ones as well. The game also is some times hard to navigate which is quite annoying. So now for the Pros: The game is Beutifull. Amazing Story, Great Gameplay and amazing Voice acting. Cons:Glitches and No map which makes navigating the make confusing. Overall You need to get Bioshock Infinite without a doubt one of the best games ever created. I give BioShock Infinite a 9.5/10
Now for the Columbias Finest Pack. The guns are incredible. The make the game a breeze so if you want some great weapons and gear i highly suggest you get it no matter what. I give Columbias Finest 8/10
Now for the story dlc.
Clash in the Clouds is a horde mode done Bioshock Style. Its quite difficult so if youre looking for a challenge definetly pick this up but otherwise just skip it because its kinda boring. I give Clash In the Clouds a 6/10
Now to avoid spoilers for infite all im gonna say about it takes place in rapture after the events of Infite.
So the first Episode of Burial at sea is bad. Im really sad to say this but it is. Its incredibly short and the story barely makes sense. Honestly its not very good so only buy it if you want to complete the full story. I give Burial at Sea episode 1 a 5/10
Burial At Sea episode is quite diffrent. In episode 2 you play as Elizabeth and the gameplay revolves around stealth rather than Brute Force. This episode is quite good and its quite creepy and it also shows the events leading up to the first bioshock. I give Burial At Sea Episode 2 a 7/10

Wasted potential: the game. A lot of themes are mentioned in this game, but the story never really builds on them. It tries to introduce multiple themes about multiple universes, the futility of our choices, and various religious and racial themes, but it doesn't really implement any of them well. The story is also riddled with plot holes, and the combat is viciously dumbed down. Most vigors act similarly with only a few exceptions, you can only carry 2 weapons at one time, hacking has been removed, a Halo-esque shield system replaces first aid kits, and ammo is no longer scare but plentiful. Comparing this to the original System Shock games, it's almost like they're exact opposites. I can't really understand why this is an entry into the Bio/Systemshock series. It lacks the survival horror elements of the previous games (as well as any sense of atmosphere). It's sad to see that people are praising this as the "Citizen Kane of gaming". What does that say about our standards?

One of the most colorful games I have played in a while. Too bad some enemies are just more frustrating than fun to fight. Handyman, I'm talking you, damn bullet sponge.

Aside from that, the ending has so many WTF moments, and and the two weapon system, why Irrational, why? THat's only suitable in games like Left 4 Dead, and MMO shooters.

Also, this game has so many worlds, Cave Johnson would be pleased.

Excellent jeu ! 

L'histoire, les décors, tout est super. 
Le concept de la ville est originale (une ville qui flotte dans les airs), on dirait vraiment un autre monde.

Puis le fait qu'Elisabeth nous suivent durant l'aventure est un vrai plus niveau immersion, on prend du plaisir à se balader en ville. Bon même si les 3/4 du temps, on se fight et y'a du sang partout.

De plus, le jeu propose un contenu très complet pour renforcer l'immersion soit : Les voxophones, bon c'est pour mieux comprendre ce qu'il se passe, mais aussi les petit projecteurs en ville qui expliquent son histoire, qui la rend plus réaliste entre autre. On débarque pas dans un endroit ou on ne sait rien en gros.

Enfin c'est vraiment une bonne suprise, puis franchement, le scénario est énorme !


Oh oh oh, et l'OST ! Elle est génial !

Один из шедевров игровой индустрии, очень приятная графика, интересный сюжет, неожиданная концовка ~
Жаль, что продолжения не будет, очень бы хотелось посмотреть на дальнейшее развитие сюжета, но увы 
Советую всем окунуться в мир этой чудесной игры (!)

Probablement l'un des jeux les plus beaux et les plus travaillés jamais créé dans le monde vidéoludique depuis sa création.
TOUT est excellent dans ce jeu, TOUT est parfaitement dosé et surtout TOUT LE MONDE devrait en faire son jeu de référence et de comparaison...
J'ai beaucoup de mal à ne pas le déterminer comme étant le meilleur jeu de tous les temps, probablement à cause de l'histoire beaucoup trop compliquée et longue à comprendre pour être accessible à une catégorie de joueurs plus large (le 94/100 vient probablement de là...), et aussi sûrement à cause du gameplay de moins bonne qualitée que le 1er Bioshock...
Vous voulez voir l'ART dans le jeu vidéo ? Jouez et ACHETEZ Bioshock Infinite !

BioShock infinite was without doubt the #1 game of 2013.
That being said 2013 was a pretty dry year with most games being over-hyped copy and pastes of worn out formulas but BioShock was one of maybe two or three AAA titles which didn't conform to this trend having an intriguing story, a satisfying progression system and a compelling world just begging to be explored. However there were a few noticeable issues, for example the game was in quite a few areas a bit to linear, the story forced you to make moral decisions which had no noticeable effect on the overall story, the ending felt like it was rushed being almost completely unrelated to all of the story up to that point (SPOILER: Your actually the bad guy from the past she is you daughter she drowns you 'cause you only get to kill your dad once (#YOGKYDO) and you left with an uber ambiguous scene which implies that you're actually still alive). Bus aside from those problems this is a really fun and engrossing experience which will keep calling you back until your seen it through. Tonally this game is very different from the BioShocks and System Shocks in that the gloomy depressed feeling is removed and replaced with this Passive-Aggressive wonderland. If your looking for an RPG experience like the BSs and SSs then you will be a bit disappointed as this is more of a FPS.  8.5/10 A legitimately engrossing experience that shouldn’t be missed.
Un juego del p... muy buena trama, y muy buen nivel de dificultad
This game will blow your mind!!! Highly recommend buying it.

This game is just bland and boring. The vigors are cool at first, but there's not much to the combat after that. The game gets incredibly repetitive with fighting the same boring enemies over and over again, skylines don't do much to vary the combat either. The story is also a convoluted mess that tries to hard to be incredible and over the top that it just seems silly and the ending was simply not worth it. I was looking forward to this game so much after hearing the incredible things about it, but it failed to live up to any excpectations i had. There are better shooters to play, dont waste your time on this convulted piece of garbage. The graphics are nice though.

Graficas: Exelentes!!  Historia: Inovidable :´)    Jugabilidad: Bastante Adaptable.  Este es uno de esos juegos que se guardan un espacio en tus recuerdos, uno de esos juegos donde la historia de envuelve y quieres descubrir mas y mas, en fin. para hacer esto corto xD, este juego no es una perdida de dinero, tus decisiones a lo largo del juego afectan el final, no voy a poner spoliers traquilo :3, pero ya en serio, sus graficas son tan realistas como tu CPU o Laptop soporten, los controles son sencillos de usar y personalizables, tiene varios tutoriales y consejos durante el juego para que no te pierdas, para acabar, mientras mas explores el mundo y no te andes como loco solo avanzando, disfrutalo, entiende la historia, deja que te envuelva. COMPRA ESTE JUEGO SI QUIERES PASAR BUENOS RATOS CON LA ACCION Y LA HISTORIA ENVOLVENTE QUE POSEE ESTE FANTASTICO JUEGO
Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado.
Excelente!

PROS:
           - great story
           - good developed characters
           - fantastic voice acting
           - excellent and fun gameplay mechanics
           - beautiful and detailed enviroments ( City of Columbia )
           - fantastic graphics and art style
           - mindblowing ending

CONS:
           - no multiplayer

Well, what to say about Bioshock Infinite that isnt already known. This is without doubt one of the best, if not the best game of the 7th generation. Fantastic story and characters, especially Elizabeth, good graphics, fun combat and an ending that you will not forget so soon. Its just amazing how many work, money and effort was put by the developers of Irrational Games to create this masterpiece. This is gaming at his best and just a few games can match the atmosphere, story, gameplay and the artstyle of Bioshock. The only downside is that there is no multiplayer but the campaign is about 12-15 hours long and when you see the ending you will want to play it again. Believe me, you will. All in all this is a game you must have. Play this masterpiece.

FINAL SCORE : 9.6

Bioshock - самая охуетительнейшая серия игр в которую я когда либо играл , с самым сильным, смелым и продуманным сюжетом, который не оставит равнодушным никого! Bioshock Infinite - не исключение, если вы не знакомы с этой серией в принципе, и если вы любитель сюжетных игр, то данный (без преувеличения) ШЕДЕВР не должен быть вами проигнорирован.

I have now played all 3 Bioshock games and Infinite is my favorite although the other 2 games were amazing as well. Infinite has great graphics, a great storyline, and a lot of small things that can keep you occupied for hours. This game is my favorite game I have played and I will keep playing it for months to come. Couldn't find many infusions though and I looked everywhere except i guess the places that they were... oh well. Great game though
